SELECT
,COUNT(R.RATE_NO) ,ROUND(AVG(RATE_STAR),1) FROM CONTENTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN RATE R ON C.C_NO = R.C_NO WHERE C.C_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.C_TYPE = #{type} GROUP BY
ORDER BY COUNT(RATE_NO) DESC
ORDER BY C.C_DATE DESC

SELECT , R.RATE_NO, R.M_NO, R.RATE_STAR, R.RATE_COMMENT, R.RATE_DATE, R.RATE_LIKE, M.M_ID FROM CONTENTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN RATE R ON C.C_NO = R.C_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.M_NO = R.M_NO WHERE C.C_STATUS = 'Y' AND C.C_NO = #{ no } ORDER BY RATE_LIKE DESC

SELECT COUNT(RATE_STAR) as "RATE_COUNT" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=0.5 then 1 end ) AS "_05" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=1 then 1 end ) AS "_1" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=1.5 then 1 end ) AS "_15" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=2 then 1 end ) AS "_2" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=2.5 then 1 end ) AS "_25" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=3 then 1 end ) AS "_3" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=3.5 then 1 end ) AS "_35" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=4 then 1 end ) AS "_4" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=4.5 then 1 end ) AS "_45" ,COUNT(CASE WHEN RATE_STAR=5 then 1 end ) AS "_5" ,ROUND(AVG(RATE_STAR),1) as "RATE_AVG" FROM RATE WHERE C_NO = #{ no }
SELECT CP.C_NO, CP.PEOPLE_NO, CP.CP_ROLE, P.PEOPLE_NAME, P.PEOPLE_JOB, P.PEOPLE_RENAMED_FILENAME FROM CONTENTSPEOPLE CP JOIN PEOPLE P ON CP.PEOPLE_NO = P.PEOPLE_NO WHERE C_NO = #{ no }
